case_data.name: Haas v. Board of Supervisors of San Bernardino County
settlement_agreement: Court Approved Settlement or Consent Decree
case_data.summary: [This summary is temporary while we research the case.] This is a case in which men incarcerated in a San Bernardino County Type II detention facility sued the Board of Supervisors of San Bernardino County, alleging that the prison was significantly overpopulated and that their rights were being violated. The case was filed in 1998, in the San Bernardino Superior Court.
